question: Which of the following is incorrect statement about various ores?
option1: Borax is an ore of Sodium
option2: Dolomite is an ore of Aluminium
option3: The chemical formula of Magnetite is Fe<sup>3</sup>O<sup>4</sup>
option4: Flourspar is an ore of Potassium
answer: Flourspar is an ore of Potassium
explanation: Fluorite or Fluorspar is an ore of Calcium. It is a mineral composed of calcium fluoride. It belongs to the family of halide minerals.
